name: aws-ec2-webapp-react-typescript-template
description: Reference implementation for deploying a webapplication using AWS EC2 servers
author: Rajnish Srivastava

scripts.@comment app: primary commands for running the application, use 'deploy' for installing the app. In case of cloud formation, invoke 'update' for installing updates
scripts.deploy:tf: npm run web:build & npm run web:package & npm run repo:push & npm run tf:deploy
scripts.deploy:cfn: npm run web:build & npm run web:package & npm run repo:push & npm run cfn:create
scripts.update:cfn: npm run web:build & npm run web:package & npm run repo:push & npm run cfn:update
scripts.web:build: cd web & npm install & npm run build
scripts.web:package: mkdirp dist & rimraf dist/* & cd web/build & bestzip ../../dist/app.zip *
scripts.@comment repo: repository related commands - where the deployment package is stored, sort of like an elastic container registry...used s3 bucket.
scripts.repo:push: cross-var aws s3api put-object --bucket=$npm_package_config_awsBucket --key app-$npm_package_config_buildNumber.zip --body dist/app.zip --profile=$npm_package_config_awsProfile
scripts.cfn:validate: npm run cfn:validate:master & npm run cfn:validate:vpc & npm run cfn:validate:security-groups & npm run cfn:validate:cloudtrail & npm run cfn:validate:application
scripts.tf:graph: cd deploy/terraform & terraform graph | dot -Tsvg > graph.svg
